Class UserPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Entity.Entities.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Entity.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Entity.Entities.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.Entity.Player.PlayerPlane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class UserPlane extends FighterPlane
Represents the player's plane in the game. Extends FighterPlane to provide specific player-controlled behavior.

  • Property Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • UserPlane

      public UserPlane(javafx.scene.image.ImageView background, int initialHealth)
      Constructs a UserPlane with the specified background and initial health.
      Parameters:
      background - the background image for key event registration
      initialHealth - the initial health of the player's plane

  • Method Details

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the plane based on user input and screen boundaries.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the player's plane, handling input and movement. handleInput() is called to handle user input.
      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • handleInput

      private void handleInput()
      Handles user input to control the plane's movement and actions.

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile from the player's plane.
      Specified by:
      fireProjectile in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      a UserProjectile if enough frames have passed since the last shot otherwise null

    • activateFireRateBoost

      public void activateFireRateBoost(long durationInMillis)
      Activates a temporary boost to the plane's fire rate.
      Parameters:
      durationInMillis - the duration of the fire rate boost in milliseconds

    • isMovingVertically

      private boolean isMovingVertically()
      Checks if the plane is currently moving vertically.
      Returns:
      true if the plane has a non-zero vertical velocity multiplier, otherwise false

    • isMovingHorizontally

      private boolean isMovingHorizontally()
      Checks if the plane is currently moving horizontally.
      Returns:
      true if the plane has a non-zero horizontal velocity multiplier, otherwise false

      public void stop()
      Stops the plane's movement.

    • addHealth

      public void addHealth()
      Adds health to the player's plane. FighterPlane.addHealth() is called to add health.
      Overrides:
      addHealth in class FighterPlane

    • getNumberOfKills

      public int getNumberOfKills()
      Gets the total number of kills achieved by the player.
      Returns:
      the total kill count

      public void incrementKillCount()
